citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Although the facility provides enrichment to the birds, they do not have an environmental enhancement plan in place to
promote the overall psychological well-being of the birds at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow a
species appropriate plan for environmental enhancement to promote the psychological wellbeing of the birds that is within
industry standards and approved by the veterinarian. Additionally, the plan must address special considerations for the
single housed male quail that does not have access to see or hear birds of his own or compatible species. The plan must
be made available for future inspections.
Correct by February 29, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Ashley Alger n
